name: vikunja-quick-add
description: Chrome extension for quickly adding tasks to Vikunja (requires v1.0.0+)
author: Wulf C. Krueger

scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src public assets manifest.json LICENSE dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../vikunja-quick-add.zip .
scripts.watch: echo 'Development mode - load unpacked extension from root directory'
